name: Yehia Amar
text: Visited just under 2 years ago - I remember this Pizza joint well: fast service, good prices and good-quality Pizza. I had the regular cheese pizza. Due to the dough press they have, it's prepared pretty fast. Happy to return when I'm back in Boston.

name: Spencer Pozder
text: Pizza was tasty but lacking toppings (why order the special spicy pizza if there are slices without anything but sauce and cheese??). Pickup was quick but crowded

name: Jennifer Stuart
text: Ordered the art pizza which is supposed to have artichoke, garlic, ricotta cheese, mozzarella and dots of red sauce. First off the pizza was killed in the oven it was black and snapped when you broke a piece off. Second they put so much ‚Ä¶More

name: David Y.
text: Fast, high-quality and not crazy-priced. If solo, get the $9.95 BYO (Build Your Own) 11-inch pie. "Unlimited" toppings are included. A lot of good "old school" pizza spots in Boston, this is sort of a "new-school" approach, and a better one, in my opinion. Very limited outdoor seating (two tables of two)

name: bostonfitness Mtz
text:
Hungry?? I really love this place, have fresh vegetables and a great taste!!
Make your own choices!
Vegan? No problem great options and
Meat lovers are welcome too.

name: Kathleen Attardo
text: Blaze Pizza is delicious. The classic red sauce with mozzarella cheese & ricotta cheese is my favorite!! You can build your own pizza even with salad on it!! üòã

name: Nicholas Vaughn
text: If you like toppings and don't mind the sloppy goodness then go here and get the custom pizza. You won't be disappointed.

name: Shawn Surma
text: Very good pizza. Fast plenty of options for toppings. Great idea. The staff does not seem to be friendly to each other. Also during the busy lunch crowd they had a table with Togo boxes all over.

name: Numbers Madrid
text: Great place for delicious, made to order, pizza put together and baked right in front of you!! Ikram and Houda took great care of me with just the right amount of toppings that I ordered!! Into the oven and cooked just right and out and ‚Ä¶More

name: mark fudge
text: I went with a bunch of friends, we had a few different kind of pizza, the bean dip was good and the drinks were find . We just had a great time and the employees our friendly.

name: Josh G
text: Delicious pizza with fast and friendly staff. They gave me candy on Halloween with my pizza !

name: Dan Panea
text: Good job on using fresh veggies and cheese. I never tried ham, but looks also fresh. Overall, is a great pizza from a fast food joint.

name: Todd Graves
text: Pizza, mmm, super good. Staff treated us so kindly. Similar to a place in Denver I loved.

name: T O
text: Severely understaffed at night. Took 30 minutes to get my pizza! The first one they burnt it, it was black all the way around and they seriously thought I would pay for that? No way! I‚Äôm glad I didn‚Äôt DoorDash the order because I wouldn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Marcus Hardy
text: Service was great and ingredients were great. Staff was really nice and the price was fair for the amount of pizzas that were bought.

name: Roberto Middleton
text: Outstanding spot for tasty Pizza. it's so tasty. they have so many reviews for a reason.

name: Ezgi T.
text: Build your own pizza! Choose the dough, ingredients,  and the toppings. It will be ready in less than 10 mins. Try the dough knots, you will thank me later!

name: Nathan DePaulo
text: Thin, blackened crusts. Not my jam, but you might like it. Lots of ingredients to choose from. Final result is fine, not great.

name: smiral patel
text: Cooking pizza with metal badge to identify the pizza. Wonder Boston Board Of Health is aware of this or not.

name: David Medeiros
text: Always delicious pizza and it's done quick. Great measure implemented during Covid to keep customers food and the employees safe.

name: David Ortega
text: The Customer service here is awesome. They were very polite, food came out within decent time regarding the amount of customers, and this location was very clean. I know there are other Blaze Pizza‚Äôs in the area, but this one is the only ‚Ä¶More

name: Milo Acuna
text: I had a great  in this place. We liked the great atmosphere and the meals. The staff members were super affable. I‚Äôm happy we eventually managed to eat here.

name: Gourav Shenoy
text: I would recommend the "build your own pizza", specially because of the flexibility to play around with the ingredients as per your need. Good variety of fairly good sauce, cheese, meat and vegs. Also, I would suggest eating it when it's freshly baked out of the oven, as the base is crisp.

name: Peter LaPorte
text: This Blaze location is extremely good. I went on a Friday night during the dinner rush and was in and out in only about 10 minutes. ‚Ä¶More

name: Soleivy Silverio
text: Honestly this was the best pizza I've had in a long time. This place is like a subway but for pizza instead. I was waited on Nolan who was super nice and funny. He tried to make my pizza into a smiley face but I ended getting too many toppings haha. Definitely recommend!

name: Tommy Vo
text: First time here and I love it. Got the meat eater and it was great. Staffs are really nice. My gfs pizza was not as hot as it should be but overall it was a great experience

name: ÈÉ≠Ëä≥Â¶ò
text:
It‚Äôs amazing ü§§ü§§ It tastes really delicious!!
And it doesn‚Äôt take a long time for a fresh pizza. Besides, you can create your own special one.

name: KOUMI Sea
text:
The best pizza for me in BostonÔºöÔºâ
I would like to eat everyday!
Choose what u like. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kartik Chanana
text: Best pizza place ever.

name: Amanda Chang
text: Super friendly attentive staff taught me how to customize my own pizza since it was my first time here. The pizza is so delicious and fresh. Highly recommended

name: Joel Rivera
text: Very friendly and fast service. I like the concept of being able to see all the ingredients in front of you and being able to pick and choose what you want. I would definitely recommend this place. The pizza was delicious.

name: sage palmetto
text: they have a delicious keto pizza crust and many topping selections. Blaze is my favorite place to get pizza!

name: Vikrant Bam
text: Good Service and quality maintained.

name: Abhishek Kadam
text: Amazing pizza. Worth a try build your own

name: Rachid M
text: Place was quite and not overcrowded. Pizza choice are ok. Food delivery was fast. I was not happy about the way pizza are handled with non vegetarian food... Pizza are small but ok. Taste was also good. Recommended.

name: Diane Reynolds
text: Quick, delicious & hot. I love that they give the calorie count. I had the Spinach-Quinoa, sweet potato salad with the vinaigrette; super tasty. Husband & I split a pizza for dinner & ordered side salads & it was just enough. Younger crowd, ‚Ä¶More

name: Hillary Lam
text: Went here yesterday and got a red vine. Wasn‚Äôt made as well as other blaze pizzas I‚Äôve been to (he barely put any basil and tomatoes) and I was waiting at the cash register to pay for over 10 minutes. No rise to the pizza either. Staff is everywhere and did not acknowledge customers waiting on them. Would not come back here!

name: Amanda Schiripo
text: This is the coolest pizza place I have ever been to! It's basically Subway for a pizza, pick your own toppings and then it is fire roasted! Great prices also! And try the garlic knots!

name: XD Y
text: very delicious food and fast service.

name: Wael Faddah
text:
Excellent idea, clean fast and beautiful.

But they have one employee that seems to hate her job...  So it all depends on who helps you.

name: Jessie Rivas
text: The current staff (Nov'19) working the lunch rushes are very courteous, hard working, precise, and overall very effective. Having a capable staff who also have the soft skills to deal with customers is rare. The pizza was tasty, the brownie ‚Ä¶More

name: Kavan Reddy
text: Super awesome and delicious. Friendly, nice staff. Some don‚Äôt pay attention so you might need to direct. Come here often

name: Howard Simpson
text: There is always a line awaiting you but the service is quick. Since asked if it was my first visit, I thought I'd receive an understanding of how to proceed placing my order but that didn't happen. Enjoyed the BBQ Chicken and Roni and Sausage Pizzas!

name: Tennis Guru
text: You can make you own pizza. Pretty good.

name: Paris living
text: The tons of options are what make this place, as well as the ability to see them craft your pizza in front of you. I think it's way more fresh compared to other pizza joints. As for customer service, this location has nice staff but if the ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelly Russell
text: Blaze pizza is the place to go. With five different crusts and a plethora of toppings to choose from, this very reasonably priced establishment has something for everyone!!! Esp love the new app and rewards you can earn. The in-app specials were a nice surprise!!

name: Billy Brewer
text: So I was traveling to Boston from Seattle. And I saw that there was a Blaze Pizza nearby and so I had to try it out. We have a lot of Mod Pizza over here, which is different and good in their own way. Blaze does a very good job taking the ‚Ä¶More

name: Percy Holmes
text: If your ever in Boston, you must stop by blaze Pizza and get your life. Amazing pizza with an amazing staff. Their varity of drink options are amazing as well.

name: Fran Mack
text: Good food fast.

name: mark humphreys
text:
Loved it, you order your pizza and the friendly cooks prepare and cook it in front of you.
Good quality pizza at a very good price.
Highly recommended.

name: David Walsh
text: Great food for reasonable prices. Staff can use work on communication and the posted menu can use a lot of work. ‚Ä¶More

name: dewan shehran
text:
The food tasted great and very fresh.

Staff very friendly and work provide fast service. ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicole Boddie
text: Unprofessional employees. The lady who took our orders was pleasant, but they had a lot of papers with different names and it just started off disorganized. When we were about to pay, the lady asked if my friend's name was Jerry. He said he ‚Ä¶More

name: Dylan Prentice
text: Honest you can't beat the value of their large pepperoni pizzas

name: Zachary Ballard
text:
This establishment is focused on the employees, NOT the customer.
Validating similar reviews, on 11/29 there was a sign saying that they were closing at 10pm. We went at 9:10pm and all the chairs were stacked on the tables and the employees were getting ready to go.

name: Stew DesMarais
text: Excellent Pizza, and a great price.

name: Robert Mierzejewski
text: Very very  good pizza. Highly recommended!!

name: Kathy Attardo
text: I have to say I've been to Little Italy in NY, the North End Boston & yes GREAT PIZZA. But I AM CRAZY ABT BLAZE PIZZA! I LOVE HOW THIN THE CRUST IS, I BUILD MY OWN BC I LIKE MARINA SAUCE, MOZZARELLA CHEESE W SOME SMALL BALLS OF RICOTTA NOT TOO MUCH NOT TOO LITTLE- PERFECT EVERYTIMEüëçüòò

name: Michael Anderson
text: Great pizza fast and made to order. Look for a location nationwide near you. The staff at this location was very friendly and helpful with suggestions. Will be back again

name: Ifran bonfire
text: Good service good ingredients and good price. Its a nice place to get your pie and they let you customize so you get exactly what you want. I like it

name: Godz Messenger
text: Yummy spot for sure

name: jimmy jimmy
text: I gave 5 star before and it was my first time here after that I came couple of times too but I think service is no so great and when they make pizza throw the ingredients and when they cut the pizza half of ur ingredients are on the floor....need good customers service...

name: Ben Pali
text: Sorely disappointed in what sounded like was going to be a good pizza. Ordered two pizzas online for pick up at a certain time. Arrived at said time, only to be totally ignored for 15 minutes. When someone finally did acknowledge me, I was ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyle Eber
text: The pizza is absolutely delicious, don't get me wrong. The crust is nice and flaky and the fire oven gives it wonderful smoky crispiness. However, the reasoning for me only giving it three stars is that the customer services isn't amazing ‚Ä¶More

name: Jordan Jacobs
text: We were in visiting a friend at Tufts.  We had a early dinner at Blaze.   Great pizza, and best value I can recall in the heart if Boston.  A very good surprise.  The staff was attentive and helpful.  Thank you for a great experience.

name: Jovan Aigbekaen
text: Loved the ability to customize my pizza however the pizzas are quite small and the taste did not knock my socks off. Pay close attention to the fine print on their window advertisements. I intended on purchasing a half pizza for $4 only to find out at the register that the promo had ended.

name: Amelia Pond
text: Food quality was good. They gave me spicy sauce, instead of the classic/regular sauce I requested, so it definitely made it harder to enjoy my pizza because my mouth was burning. But otherwise it was good. Customer service left something to ‚Ä¶More

name: Deidre Covington
text: First time in Boston, and only went here because it was across the street from my hotel. The pizza didn't taste good, and made me sick all night.

name: George Tudorache
text:
Good pizza. You can customize your or take one from the menu. It's ready in less than 10min and taste good.
Word from a guy (me) that loves pizza and live in Italy. Trust me.

name: Brian Yarbrough
text: Great pizza.  Build your own.  Just the right amount of sauce and cheese.

name: Aleda Moon
text: This is by far the best and most efficient Blaze I've ever been to! The Indian guy working the cutting/drizzle station was seriously amazing lol they cranked out 20 pizzas while we waited for our son's simple pie...wish our local Blaze was on their game at the same level

name: Manoj Kumar Kanakasabapathy
text: Chipotle for pizzas

name: Zoe Kennedy
text: Came in with a giant group (14 people). It was already pretty packed. We all got through our orders and paid quickly. Things were hectic because the restaurant had a lot of mobile orders as well as our huge group. Ikram, the amazing woman ‚Ä¶More

name: Vicky
text: Nice flavours but the base could do with being a little firmer as the pizza is pretty sloppy

name: Anna Lanza
text:
THE best pizza chain.
Fresh, lots of options in the way of toppings etc. Really appreciate the drinks too. People working this location are always friendly in my experience.

name: brian abinader
text: Great service and excellent taste. Will be back for sure!

name: Anthony Petrillo
text: Service was subpar, took 5 minutes for me to be acknowledged and another 5 to get started on my order. The employee original helping me kept lingering around not doing any work. Only positive point is it tasted very good.

name: ashish ailani
text: I love this place. Unlimited toppings, great quality and fast service

name: Kelley Drumm
text: Pizza was delicious! Pizza was thin, with just the right ratio of sauce to cheese. I even ate the crust ,which I ordinarily don't do.

name: kevin sun
text: Honestly love this place. You get to build your own pizza. It's very similar to Subway in the sense that you get to pick everything if you pick the build your own option (which is the same price as two toppings I think). The build your own ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Moffett
text: Near empty, service so-so. Went for keep pizza which was pretty good but a bit of an after taste. $4 extra making a personal pizza $11-13 is tough to handle.  The water spigot was broken and the soda water fountain sit out a mix of Sprite and carbonated water. They overcharged me by mistake but I didn't catch it.

name: Jayden Butts
text: Great pizza

name: Holly
text: GLUTEN FREE OPTIONS.  Two type of crust to choose from.

name: Morgan Slate
text: I'm a big fan of custom, fresh, thin crust pizza. Ask them to warm up your dessert too! The Subway of pizza, but better.

name: Jalela Howard
text:
Love Blaze! The food is always made with love <3
The associates work so hard and I just feel like the service is always on 10 even during the peak hour!

name: Amber Statz
text: Do not go to this Blaze location. Their workers are so unorganized and they even yell at the customers, and I even saw a few shout out ‚ÄúI‚Äôm done‚Äù when it got so busy (about 20 customers in line they were so slow), and they walked out into ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Stringer
text: Individual pizzas are a good size. The crust is nice and thin.

name: Priya Sheth
text: I really like this chain. Very clean ingredients, thin and crisp crust, at a good price.

name: Felipe Romano
text: Pizza tastes delicious - definitely great quality for the price. The issue is a total lack of seats. If they improve that aspect, they will be unbeatable. Just hope they had more franchises around Boston.

name: Steve
text: The pizza is good they kind of nickle and dime you on the toppings. Sometimes I have been there and the prep line was a mess  not very appetizing. The pizza is good all in all fills the void.

name: Moe Soliamn
text: Blazin'

name: Pedro Munari
text: Amazing pizza with fresh dough and you choose your own toppings. Very quick and delicious!

name: Roger Cloud
text: One size pizza made to order at a really cheap price. Wow, wow, wow the most gorgeous, smiling and friendly Latina women on the planet working there. Whomever hired these girls deserves a Gold Star and a Five Star ***** rating.... Roger Cloud

name: Sonika Arun Govil
text: BBQ chicken pizza was amazing!! Service was awesome too!

name: Felipe BETANCUR
text: Nice place to let your mind go and invent your own pizza

name: Benjamin Price-Olson
text: Great pizza, I like the fact that they serve half pizzas

name: David F
text: The person who made my pizza did a great job. However once my pizza was ready the person who pulled it out did not fully cut it and he left my dough nuts on the counter, when I asked for them he picked them both up and dropped them on top of my freshly baked pizza.  Good start poor finish

name: Vedaj J Padman
text: This place used to be cheaper. The pizzas are still great but now they have started charging for even water. That's a disappoint. But otherwise great

name: michael sullivan
text: Quick, delicious, and solid service.  Highly recommend for a late night, quick grab, bite to eat.

name: Griffin Stotland
text: Fast and friendly service! The pizza is really good, which is surprising how cheap it is compared to other spots in Boston. It would get a 5 star but I found that the seating availability isn't always great - that is because so many people at there eating the great pizza. Highly recommended nonetheless! üëç

name: SUPREMENEWYORKUSA
text: Ingredients are all processed meats and frozen veggies with no flavor. Nothing fresh always frozen. Bothered me to see them place the dough on top of the paper they scribbled with permanent sharpie. Pizza was undercooked at best.

name: sejal pareek
text: Bad service, the manager took my order he was standoffish and not helpful when i was ordering  my pizza, also my pizza was burnt at the bottom and i contacted them about it and never got a repsponse..

name: Liz Mah
text: So I was pretty excited for this concept! We don't have pizza shops like this in Australia. ‚Ä¶More

name: Indras Mountain
text: Open kitchen let's you see how carelessly the food is made. Employees don't seem too happy, most likely they are poorly paid.

name: Adam W Nelson
text: I love Blaze Pizza! I eat it Blaze any chance I get I don't know if it's creating your own watching it being cooked or what it is but I know that I love their Pizza. The staff is always super nice and the restaurant is always clean.

name: Drew Cameron
text: Fresh pizza, a bunch of topping options, affordable prices. Only drawbacks are that it takes a while if there's a line and customer service leaves a bit to be desired.

name: Denis Ndregjoni
text: Pizza is great. But the employees have ruined ours tonight. They had a lack of care where preparing the pizzas. Added so much salt it became inedible. But of disorganization caused them to misunderstand how we wanted it prepared. At the end ‚Ä¶More

name: Rishabh Narula
text: Really good pizza, clean place, just didn't get the full order so check before heading out.

name: Robyn McNeely
text: The kids that they can select their own toppings and the staff her are great. Totally try the dough knots!

name: Mike T
text: Great tasting pizza with a fun concept.  Service was quick and the pizza was a decent size for less than $8.

name: Ebrahim Ghazvini Zadeh
text: The order was incomplete and had to go back to make corrections. Overall the options are good, but would have liked it more if there more veggie options

name: Grace Belle
text: The location is convenient from our hotel but personally the service is substandard. The girl at the counter was so impatient üôÅ when I was choosing what sauce and toppings I'd like to put on my pizza. Although, the other girl was a little ‚Ä¶More

name: RAT DROPPINGS
text: Awesome staff.  Clean and fast (10 minutes before close) makes this even more note worthy !!!  Excellent.

name: Alex Al
text: pizza was good. Not as greasy as it may be in other places.

name: Robert Lachance
text: Decent pizza, pick your toppings, for the most part two people can share a pie.  Quick service.

name: VIJAYAMUTHAN Sidhayan Suruliande

text: BEST PIZZA AROUND!!!

text: Food was good, service was good.  My kids liked the 1/2 pie & garlic knots.  We'll return.

name: Austen H-C
text: Good pizza done quick

name: Jose Pierre
text: That $5  half pizza deal is great

name: John McNamara
text: Fresh ingredients, fired fast- what more do you want!

name: G P
text: For fast food pizza, this was fine. Didn't feel too unhealthy, and I would visit again

name: Emmanuella Fede
text: Tastes really awesome no matter what kind you get. Great if you want to share a pizza with another person, but still want your own.

name: Gege Jinstkhuu
text: Trendy and healthy eating. You can choose your pizza toppings.

name: S. Remy
text: Pretty good. Fresh. Clean ingredients. Love the build your option. Quality Pizza and quick enough prep and cook time.

name: Ajit Vyas
text: Fast-casual pizzeria with tons of topping options. Pizzas usually take about 10 min from start to finish. Download the app to earn credit for each visit, and occasional coupons. This location was pretty typical, with ample indoor and outdoor seating.

name: Vishwa Poojara
text: The pizza was amazingly good. It was thin crust and made with love.

name: Mike B
text: Consistent with other Blaze locations. When busy can burn crust a bit but good food fast for reasonable price.

name: Ryan Bricmont
text: A neat concept full of options. Blaze is the place for make your own pizza. Could be a mess for people that are super allergic to things, but the pizza is really satisfying. Good garlic knots too!

name: Griselle Jimenez
text: Good choice for the money. Only negative comment I could give is that their standard red sauce is a little bland

name: Jacob Cardoza
text: Very good service and great pizza

name: Mike Payne
text: They burn it sometimes but the quality is good

name: Ken P.
text: Very good pizza, but a little pricey for just lunch.

name: meet patel
text: Good

name: Rohini Narayanaswamy
text: While i love the concept and money value of Blaze Pizza, this place is sometimes nothing short of a disaster zone. Weekend nights are insanely crowded. Not just the number of customers in line but also the POURING number of orders via uber ‚Ä¶More

name: Saritha Manesh
text: Fresh and fast service.

name: Rosmery Villavicencio
text: I love blaze, its all of it together. Build your own pizza for just $8.75 with all the toppings you'd like and they have vegan cheese. This place is perfect to satisfy many

name: James Jumper
text: I put Blaze in the same category as Oath and Otto, though not as good. On the plus side, you can build the pizza you want, the ingredients are fresh, and the service is friendly. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Kellar
text: A good pizza, very flexible ingredients, all relatively high quality.

name: Ste Hen
text: No joke guys, this is by far the best pizza I've ever tasted in my life! Good prices to! Really do recommend Blaze Pizza! üòÄüëåüëè So the bottom line is FIVE STARS from the Swedish Dude! üòéü§òüçï

name: Katharine Lau
text: Came before closing and staff seemed to be having a meltdown. Good pizza for the price.

name: Maria Loza
text: Tasty pizza place that has odd toppings that taste delicious.  Big advantage  is you can add a Lot of toppings and price is reasonable. You can even add a sauce drizzle at the end. Clean and very convenient. Great place if your  in a rush

name: jeff leger
text: Great pizza done quick

name: Jewin Mendoza Fournier
text: Super nice staff. Quick and delicious! Lots of options to choose from. Nice place for a quick bite.

name: Gil Percik
text: Extremely friendly. Thin thin thin crust pizza. Yummmylisious!

name: Richie Mendes
text:
Went here today with my wife because we LOVE pizza. We traveled about 20 miles to Boston  and wanted to make this our first stop.
Sadly we where disappointed as soon as we walked in. This place reminded us of a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim Collins
text: Tried Blaze Pizza for the first time, phenomenal, awesome and very well priced. Great customer service, the place was very busy however it didn't take long at all to get our order. It was cooked perfectly and exactly what I ordered. I will definitely be going back!!

name: Matt La Porte
text: Fantastic pizza, great service, can‚Äôt complain about anything other than that that Lebron (missed the playoffs) owns this place. 5 stars otherwise.

name: Bhagyasree Nimmagadda
text: Excellent pizza . It‚Äôs delicious crunchy

name: Amanda Hutter
text: They used to let you do unlimited toppings for $8.95. They now limit the toppings at that price. Their service used to be very fast and friendly, now they mumble and don‚Äôt look up. Seems much slower than is used to be. I had no line in front of me and they took a bunch of mobile orders instead of starting my pizza.

name: Spencer Duncan
text: I wish there was a zero star, literally the worst service. Was rushed, Very dude, didnt ask about what cheese, didnt get cups I paid for.

name: Jack Fitzpatrick
text: Brilliantly priced, friendly staffed and the most delicious food. 10/10

name: Shailu Mookim
text: Loved the pie here! You can customize all you want, never get bored of same type of pizza! Olive oil, pesto, etc. after pizza is cooked are free options and are amazing! Thin crust pizza was absolutely amazing! This is like Chipotle style ‚Ä¶More

name: Tony Babecka
text: Good place and made fresh to order.  Prices have steadily climbed since opening a few years ago.  Think Chipotle or Qdoba, but for pizza.

name: Cornell Robinson
text: Build you own is the way to go. Create you ultimate pizza for a low price.

name: Anesa Tmusic
text: Amazing, per usual

name: Kevin Glynn
text: Blaze is seriously awesome. It's vegan friendly, gluten free friendly, foodie friendly, and just plain good... And friendly. ‚Ä¶More

name: Marie Lisa
text: Love, love the whole make your own concept

name: paul h
text: Good and fast.  Not very expensive.

name: Jake O
text: Great pizza, great price, happy wife

name: Hosanna Panasyuk
text: Wasn't too crowded when I went. Good customer service. Great tasting pizza, I couldn't believe that I ate the whole thing!!

name: Breno Annes
text: Great value with their online special of two pizzas for $10. However, I keep asking for medium well but keep getting medium cooked pizzas.

name: Kyle B
text: Smelled like a bathroom as soon as we stepped in, rude hostesses and never got a receipt. Pizza was soggy and thrown around, asked for dine in and got it served as carry out anyway. Wouldn't come back

name: Amogh TV
text: It is a very good quick bite and for the most part employees are very good and ask customers for extra toppings. Overall good service and taste especially the white top

name: Bhavin Patel
text: Great pizza . Was my first time and I loved it.   Good quality.  It was busy when I was there and staff was working their full capacity.  Cheers !!

name: Daniel Flanagan
text: It's pricey, the quality is wildly inconsistent, and the employees never seem happy to be there.  At the same time it's hard to mess up pizza.

name: Stephen Grace
text: The hype is real about this place!! A must try. Build your own üçï , so many choices!! The speed and service is great! The balsamic glaze at the end on top of the pizza was amazing!!

name: Funnyboy
text: Just like every Bostonian Pizza...thin and tasty!

name: SantanaFirpo
text: Great pizza and good service

name: Raisa Choudhury
text: Can always count on blaze to serve the perfect pizza üçï

name: Robert Sears
text: One of the best pizza places I've been to. Fast and streamlined service with many options for sauce, cheese, toppings, etc. Gluten free crust options also available (though for an additional $2 unfortunately). All-around a great place to eat and hang out. Been here a lot and never had a bad time before.

name: Chloe May
text:
The best make your own personal pizza you can get
Also great house made beverages and cookies

name: William Guo
text: Server rushed my order and cut me off before I was done with my custom pizza. The price is nice and all but the service was pretty bad. For quality its pretty much the same as all other Blaze pizzas. I would definitely say you get your moneys worth at Blaze Pizza.

name: DunstanTheDude
text: Fast service, great cheap food. Assembly line syatem for building your own pizza which i highly recommend as you get unlimited toppings.

name: Jack Cornish
text: Great location, always delicious. Plus they have strawless lids now üòé

name: Pamela Li
text: The staff here are really nice and helpful. I really like the concept where you can see the ingredients before ordering. My pizza came out good but I wish it was slightly hotter.

name: Tyler Sclodnick
text: The signature pizza cost the same as the build-you-own pizza so you can add anything you want to the signature pizzas.

name: Jank Hank
text: All the pizzas are good. Prices are right. Staff is helpful in case you need help choosing a topping or flavor

name: J.
text: Pizza is amazing. Service could be better

name: Lauren I
text: I really really want to like this place because I like the concept and it is convenient. However, my orders keep getting messed up in some way nearly every time I go. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mikey D
text: Not bad! It's pretty cheap, easy and convenient pizza made fresh. I'd say it's the Subway of pizza. It taste like a brick oven Papa Ginos and has tons of toppings you dont usually see. #Glutenfreepizza

name: Michelle W
text: They did not call one of our pizzas and that made us late for the start of our show.

name: Jessa Ortiz
text: Delicious pizza just how you prefer, can make it vegan as well.

name: Jake Keenan
text: Great food and a cool place to eat

name: Jaime McDade
text: The pizzas here are delicious and as fresh as they come.  Everytime we see a comedy show, our last stop of the night is at Blaze Pizza for that late night grub pick me up.

name: TJ West
text: Personal pizzas made before your eyes. It's like a Subway experience but with making your own pizza.

name: Dara Raynah Jones
text: Imma die hard Blaze Pizza lover, but THIS location is super slow and sloppy with their pizza building. They throw toppings on any kind of way when in a rush with a big lunch crowd. I‚Äôve been to other locations that don‚Äôt lose their cool. ‚Ä¶More

name: Craig Richards
text: Best of the best. I'm telling prez

name: Miles Paron
text: Blaze Pizza! Love it!

name: John Moran
text: Awesome pizza! Great prices!

name: ma jo
text: Really good pizza fast. For What They Are And do, They Do It Well

name: Henry SooHoo
text: Staff here is nice and helpful. It was my first time at Blaze and they walked me through the process. They checked up on me part way through my meal to make sure it was satisfactory. Excellent service and good custom pizza!

name: Yolanda Vu
text: Stumbled upon this place while walking to another food spot and decided to walk in. Easy, fast and friendly service. The pizzas are very affordable and tasty. You can easily eat one pizza on your own or share it with a side salad. We went with the latter and our bill for 2 was around $15!

name: Steve Arnold
text: The pizza is so good, I want to open a location in my town. I went twice during my Boston visit, and I wish I had gone again. On top of that, the workers were very friendly. It not upscale or fancy, but I would call it hip. This is the place to eat for sure!

name: Brian Burke
text: Pi day, can't beat the deal.  Thin crust and well done with lots of toppings, great pi≈∫za

name: Charan Atwal
text: Great place to eat. The staff are friendly and the pizza tastes great. Also, the system to order pizza is quick and simple.

name: Keith Moreau
text: Great pizza, reasonable price, friendly service

name: Erion Lipo
text: Food was great. The wait was very long; 45 mins for 2 pizzas and we called the order in 15mins before we got there.

name: Adam Riveiro
text: Great concept. Staff was very friendly and helpful in understanding how to put a pizza together. Prices were very reasonable and the pizza was outstanding!

name: Haritz Barrenetxea Arrinda
text: Not bad. Fast service and good quality pizza.

name: Tyler Manoukian
text: BYOP for under 10 dollars is a fantastic deal. There's 6 different meats to choose from,  at least 4 sauces, 6 or 6 different veg, plus finishers and 5 differentcheeses. The service is very fast too.

name: Mike Lopez
text: Great customer service, everyone was helpful and friendly. Food was delicious.

name: Steve McCoy
text: Great tasting pizza is easy to provide, and Blaze does that. They also give it to you quickly, and you can control just how much goes on top of it as they prepare it as you watch!  Would definitely go back.

name: Sasha Sasha
text: So good! Really fun place to get pizza. It's like the "Moes" of pizza! You get to choose your own toppings and watch them create it. Highly reccomend the doughknots too!

name: Jonathan Peps
text: Quick pizza, use the app to skip the lines if you don't like waiting

name: Camielle Weetly
text: Great service, clean and delicious

name: Jatin Sethi
text: Great value. Good selection of veges in pizza toppings.

name: David Henry
text: Good, thin pizza prepared quickly, I like it!

name: Ritu Agrawal
text: We ordered veg pizza..but it's had some kind of gorgonzola cheese. It takes to me personally very weird.  I told the staff about it.and they were so courteous to change my pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Lyddell
text: Great pizza, sensible size thin crust. Very fresh ingredients all one prize and servings generous. Great service and clean. Good value for money.

name: Jessica Brouillette
text: Super friendly service!

name: Wesline Simplice
text: Finally able to have a pizza with cheese. I'm lactose intolerant and usually have to forego the cheesy goodness but they have vegan cheese. My life has changed!

name: Lisy's World vlogs

name: Jeff Kleinschmidt
text:
Floor is dirty
Staff talking to each other without acknowledging customers.
Pizza was okay
Service is lacking.

name: Patrick McLaughlin

text: Ordered a Meat Eater with ricotta, received a cheese pizza with ricotta. When I checked in, I heard staff state the Meat Eater was cooking, so I didn't bother to check the order until walked away. Still good, but c'mon.

name: Theresa Estrada

Bad customer service, completely inconsistent with other locations.

text:
This is an honest 5 star. I went at about midnight and the staff was excellent, especially due to the fact my friends were all very intoxicated. This IS THE MOE'S/CHIPOTLE  OF PIZZA PLACES.
I WISH TERE WAS ONE IN CONNECTICUT

text: Great selection of drinks (mango/strawberry aqua fresca, lemonade, fountain drinks) paired with a filling personal pizza. Friendly staff who are willing to explain the process to you.

name: Jenna Fucetola

text: It's like Chipotle, but for pizza. Super affordable and delicious. I want this business model to succeed so badly so these restaurants are everywhere!
